page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart guides annotation definition legend object
page.description: The definition of a legend annotation.

discussion.p: The "legend" annotation can be used to add legend to the chart. A legend label will be drawn for each group in the chart (see *[link:A5.chart Definition Map Object]*), and will consist of a marker and label. The default label HTML will be the group name. A marker will be drawn that uses the color assigned to the group. See *[link:A5.chart Rect Layer Object]*, *[link:A5.chart Polar Layer Object]*, *[link:A5.chart Linear Layer Object]* and *[link:A5.chart Radial Layer Object]* "colors" setting for details.

property.name: location
property.description: The location of the legend. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Location Object]*.

property.name: align
property.description: How to align the legend relative to the location. Values can be "center", "above", "below", "before", "after", "adj-above", "adj-below", "adj-before" and "adj-after". Multiple alignments can be applied by combining values using spaces (for example "above after"). The "adj" prefix will make the given alignment occur after the rotation (if any) has been applied.

property.name: rotate
property.description: The rotation (in degrees) to apply to the text.

property.name: offset
property.description: The offset of the legend.

property.name: major
property.description: The major offset relative to the alignment. The default value is 0.

property.name: minor
property.description: The minor offset relative to the alignment. The default value is 0.

property.name: flow
property.description: The "flow" of the labels inside of the legend. Values can be "ltr" (the default), "rtl", "ttb" and "btt".

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to add to the legend element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the class name.

property.name: style
property.description: The style to add to the legend element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the style.

property.name: html
property.description: The HTML text to display in the legend label. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the HTML.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to add to the legend label element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the class name.

property.name: style
property.description: The style to add to the legend label element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the style.

property.name: attrs
property.description: The attributes to add to the legend label element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the attributes.

property.name: tip
property.description: The mouseover tip to add to the legend label element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the tip.

property.name: location
property.description: The location of the marker relative to the label text. Values can be "before" (the default) or "after".

property.name: shape
property.description: The shape of the marker. Values can be "dot", "bar-v", "bar-h", "bar-bltr", "bar-tlbr", "diamond", "square" (the default), "square-round", "x", "cross", "tri-b", "tri-t", "tri-r" and "tri-l". A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the shape.

property.name: size
property.description: The size of the marker. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the size.

property.name: line
property.description: The marker line definition. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Line Object]*.

property.name: fill
property.description: The marker fill definition. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Fill Object]*.

property.name: label
property.description: The marker label. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Label Object]*.

property.name: attrs
property.description: The attributes to add to the marker element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the attributes.

property.name: tip
property.description: The mouseover tip to add to the marker element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the tip.
